hero.title: A <0>simple</0> app that analyzes <0>your</0> data
hero.subtitle: Created by a team of developers passionate about social medias, Diversity allows you to analyze your data on social networks.

bulletpoints.1: <0>100% Transparent</0> - No data is collected or stored on our servers.
bulletpoints.2: <0>Free</0> - You don't have to pay anything to use Diversity.
bulletpoints.3: <0>No spam</0> - We won't send you any spam.
